issue.title: gemini.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gemini.google.com/app/78e6310129a66345](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgemini.google.com%2Fapp%2F78e6310129a66345) ### Comment > When the AdGuard Social Media Filter is enabled, it is impossible to create a link to a Gemini chat. The “Create public link” button is missing. > > Note that this button's primary function is to generate a public link to the chat. After generating the link, some social-media buttons are displayed to share the generated link on social media. It would make sense to filter those buttons, but filtering the link-generating button removes functionality unrelated to social media. Username: `@nisavid` ### Screenshots
